name: Travel Buddy
description: "The app was created as final project in </salt> bootcamp. It was conceived for travelers that wish to find a buddy to travel with. They can either create trips and wait for people to join them, or search through other people's trips and join them in their adventures."

name: Hack-Day
description: "Full stack project that was created in 1 day. It generates random holidays destination for an undecided ones. It also shows current weather and pictures of the place."

name: Quiz App
description: "Quiz that generates questions thanks to Trivia API. UI was created by using Material UI"

name: Web Prototype
description: "The website was designed to promote house projects. There is a configurator that automatically estimates costs of houses and shows the next available date of starting the construction"
